title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: User is unable to log in to their account. They are receiving a 'User not found' error even though they are using the correct username and password.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Customer's credit card was declined during checkout. They have confirmed the card is active and has sufficient funds. They have tried multiple times with the same result.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: User is unable to download the invoice for their recent purchase. When they click the 'Download' button, nothing happens or they are redirected to an error page.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: A customer's billing address is incorrect in their order history. They are unable to edit it, and they are concerned about the financial implications.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: The mobile app crashes immediately after launching on all iOS devices. This started happening after the latest app update.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: A refund was approved and processed 10 business days ago, but the customer has not yet received the funds in their bank account. The refund transaction is showing 'Pending'.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: User is unable to log in because their 2FA code is not working. The code from the authenticator app is being rejected as 'invalid'.

title: Unable to Update Profile Picture
description: A user is trying to upload a new profile picture but it fails with a 'File size too large' error, even though the image is a small JPEG file.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal
description: Customer reports that their subscription was auto-renewed even though they had cancelled it. They want an immediate refund and to ensure this does not happen again.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: Customer completed a purchase successfully but never received the order confirmation email. They are worried the order was not processed correctly.
